headline: VARIAN DIFFUSION PUMP
description: Diffusion Pump    Pump will be rebuilt at time of sale. Specify desired heater voltage (120/208/240VAC).
keywords: diffusion vacuum pumps diff pumps  diff pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Diffusion Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model VHS 4
Inlet Flange ASA 101.6 mm (4.000 in)
Pumping Speed Helium 1,500.00 l/s (3,178.64 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 1,200.00 l/s (2,542.91 CFM)
Warmup Time 10 Minutes
Cooldown Time 10 Minutes
Cooling Water Required Minimum Flow: 0.15 GPM (0.57 l/m)
Water Connection 1/8" FPT
Other Information

Fluid charge: 300 cc
Power: 1450 watts
Max forepressure: No load = 0.65 torr; Full load = 0.55 torr

Power Requirements 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Depth 11.000 in (27.9 cm)
Height 16.500 in (41.9 cm)
Weight 30 lb (14 kg)
